Table of Contents

Name

duotone - make a color duotone image from a black and white image

Synopsis

duotone inimage.bw outimage.rgb r g b

Description

duotone creates a duotoned color image from a single channel image. The r g b arguments specify the color that a 50 percent gray value in the source image should become in the duotone image. Try experimenting with [lq]doutone in.bw out.rgb 200 120 80[rq].

See Also

tobw(6D)
